name: No Reload Allowed
description:
"Once upon a time there was a very very long war. Nowadays there is no more ammunition... But there are still many weapons to deal with !!!"

No Reaload Allowed is a First Personn Shooter game but without ammo. In this deathmatch game, you and three others players have to make a lot of kills. With your favourite weapons. Without ammo.

Good Luck

How to play - Movement : WASD - Fire : Left clic - Throw weapon : Right clic

This game was made during the GMTK game(jam); 2018 with the theme "GENRE, but you can't MECHANIC".
